intro: Odontostemma xerophilum var. xiangchengense, commonly known as the Xiangcheng xerophilous odontostemma, is a rare and specialized plant adapted to arid environments. It belongs to the family Apiaceae and is characterized by its succulent leaves and compact growth habit. The plant exhibits a unique ability to conserve water, making it well-suited for dry climates. Its flowers are small and clustered, often appearing in shades of white or pale yellow. Due to its limited geographic distribution and ecological specificity, it is considered a valuable subject for botanical research.
